GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Returns the properties of the specified connected cluster, including name, identity, properties, and additional cluster details.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: API to register a new Kubernetes cluster and create a tracked resource in Azure Resource Manager (ARM).

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: API to update certain properties of the connected cluster resource

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Delete a connected cluster, removing the tracked resource in Azure Resource Manager (ARM).

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: API to enumerate registered connected K8s clusters under a Resource Group

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetConnectedClusters
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: API to enumerate registered connected K8s clusters under a Subscription

OtherOperations.Name: GetClusterUserCredential
OtherOperations.Description: Gets cluster user credentials of the connected cluster with a specified resource group and name.
